CustomField.formula:
IF( ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()) <= 365,IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==1,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()))&" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972112000/Green","Green",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==2,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()))&" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972112000/Green","Green",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==3,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()))&" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972112000/Green","Green",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==4,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972112000/Green","Green",15,20),TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()))&" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972112000/Green","Green",15,20))))),
IF(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()) > 365 && ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()) < 730,IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==1,TEXT(Product_Date__c - TODAY()) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972152000/Yellow","Yellow",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==2,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972152000/Yellow","Yellow",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==3,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972152000/Yellow","Yellow",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==4,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972152000/Yellow","Yellow",15,20),TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972152000/Yellow","Yellow",15,20))))),
IF(ABS(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) >= 730,IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==1,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972132000/Red","Red",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==2,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972132000/Red","Red",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==3,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972132000/Red","Red",15,20),
IF(LEN(TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())))==4,TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY())) &" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972132000/Red","Red",15,20),TEXT(ABS(Product_Date__c - TODAY()))&" "& IMAGE("/resource/1537972132000/Red","Red",15,20))))),NULL) ))
CustomField.label: Age
